config-help:
This command is mainly used to configure your server. By doing `%{p}config see [option]` you will get an overview of the current configurations, and server administrators can enter `%{p}config change <option> value1, value2...` to modify a configuration, or `%{p}config del <option>` to reset the option (`%{p}config change <option>` works the same way).
The list of available options is available at <https://zbot.rtfd.io/en/latest/server.html#list-of-every-option>, but an index without any explanation can be found with the command `%{p}config list`
config-list: List of available options: %{text}More info at %{link}

edit-error.anti_raid: This level does not exist. Here is the list of the levels currently available: %{list}
edit-error.boolean: The "%{name}" option expects a boolean (True/False) parameter in value :innocent:
edit-error.category: The category %{name} could not be found
edit-error.channel: The channel "%{channel}" was not found :confused: (Enter the exact mention, name or identifier of the channel(s)
edit-error.lang: This language is not available. Here is the list of currently supported languages: %{list}
edit-error.numeric: The "%{name}" option expects a number in parameter :innocent:

prefix.invalid: Oops, it seems this prefix is invalid :thinking: If the problem persists, please choose another one
prefix.long: This prefix is too long to be used!

edit-error.role: The role "%{role}" was not found :confused: (Check upper case and special characters)
edit-error.tttdisplay: This TicTacToe usage mode does not exist. Here is the list of available modes: %{list}
edit-error.xp: This xp system doesn't exist. Here is the list of available systems: %{list}
edit-error.xp_rate: The xp rate must be between %{min} and %{max}

edit-success.boolean: The "%{opt}" option has been set to *%{val}*
edit-success.category: The '%{opt}' option has been modified with the %{val} category
edit-success.channel: The "%{opt}" option has been modified with the channels %{val}
edit-success.color: The color used for the option %{opt} is now %{val}
edit-success.emoji: The emojis for the option "%{opt}" are now %{val}
edit-success.lang: The bot language is now in %{val}

levelup_channel.any: Levelup messages will now be posted directly in the chat
levelup_channel.chan: Levelup messages will now be sent to %{val}
levelup_channel.none: Levelup messages won't be sent anymore

edit-success.prefix: The prefix has been successfully replaced by `%{val}`
edit-success.raid: The anti-raid security level is now set to **%{name}** (%{index})
edit-success.role: The "%{opt}" option has been modified with the following roles: %{val}
edit-success.text:
The option "%{opt}" has been replaced by the following text: 
```
%{val}
```
edit-success.tttdisplay: The use of the tic-tac-toe game is now set to %{val}
edit-success.xp: The xp system used is now %{val}
edit-success.xp_rate: The xp rate is now at %{val}

need-manage-server: You need the "Manage server" permission to execute this command.
not-found: The server %{guild} has not yet been registered in the database

server_desc.anti_caps_lock: Should I send a message when a member sends too many capital letters? %{value}
server_desc.anti_scam: Should I check for malicious messages and delete them? %{value}
server_desc.autoremove_xp: Experience points removed daily from inactive members: %{value}
server_desc.ban_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the command "ban": %{value}
server_desc.bot_news: List of channels where to send bot news: %{value}
server_desc.clear_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the "clear" command: %{value}
server_desc.compress_help: Should the display of the `help` command be compressed? %{value}
server_desc.enable_fun: Are the commands listed in the `!fun` command enabled? %{value}
server_desc.enable_xp: Should the xp system be enabled? %{value}
server_desc.help_in_dm: Send help message in Private Message? %{value}
server_desc.hunter: List of all chat rooms in which the game *Hunter* is active: %{value}
server_desc.kick_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the "kick" command: %{value}
server_desc.language: Current bot language for this server: **%{value}**
server_desc.leave: Message sent when a member leaves: %{value}
server_desc.levelup_channel: Channel where levelup messages are sent: %{value}
server_desc.levelup_msg: Message sent when a member earns an xp level: %{value}
server_desc.membercounter: Channel displaying your member count in its name: %{value}
server_desc.modlogs_channel: Channel where to send moderation logs: %{value}
server_desc.mute_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the "mute" command: %{value}
server_desc.nicknames_history: Should I remember nickname changes in this server? %{value}
server_desc.noxp_channels: Channels where you can't get xp: %{value}
server_desc.poll_channels: List of channels where :thumbsup: and :thumbsdown: reactions will be automatically added to each message: %{value}
server_desc.save_roles: Should roles be saved when a member leaves, in case they returns? %{value}
server_desc.say_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the command "say" : %{value}
server_desc.slowmode_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use "slowmode" and "freeze" commands: %{value}
server_desc.update_mentions: Roles mentioned in the bot changelog: %{value}
server_desc.verification_role: Roles removed when a user use the `verify` command: %{value}
server_desc.voice_category: Category in which automatic voice chat rooms will be created: %{value}
server_desc.voice_channel: Channel from which automatic voice chat rooms will be created: %{value}
server_desc.voice_channel_format: Format of automatic voice channel names: %{value}
server_desc.voice_roles: Roles given to members in a vocal channel: %{value}
server_desc.warn_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use commands "warn" and "cases": %{value}
server_desc.welcome: Message sent when a member arrives: %{value}
server_desc.welcome_channel: List of channels where to send welcome/leave messages: %{value}
server_desc.welcome_roles: List of roles automatically given to new members: %{value}

value-deleted: The "%{option}" option value has been deleted
